<template lineStart="1"><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Low level command to person to move to given position. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> person [[moveTo]] position </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> person: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> position: [[PositionATL]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_myAgent [[moveTo]] [[getPosATL]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[doMove]], [[commandMove]], [[setDestination]], [[move]], [[moveToCompleted]], [[moveToFailed]], [[addWaypoint]], [[fn_vbs_doMoveEx_(VBS2)|fn_vbs_doMoveEx]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 14, 2010 - 05:44
<dt class="note">[[User:Rübe|Rübe]]<dd class="note">moveTo is a low-level command used in [[FSM]] called with doFSM or commandFSM. See [[doFSM]] for more information about this. Use [[doMove]] everywhere else - even in FSM executed with execFSM.
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
